function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of increased decentralization of energy governance from multilateral to national, transnational, and local scales due to the frailty of global cooperation and the impact of Covid-19.","Impact":"Potential lack of coordinated response to contagious diseases at a global scale, leading to increased vulnerability to outbreaks and lack of alignment in containment measures.","Mitigation":"Enhance cooperation between regional and international organizations, strengthen the role of multilateral cooperation, and develop guidelines for coordinated responses to future pandemics.","Technologies":"Global communication technologies, data analysis tools for tracking and monitoring contagion, and collaborative platforms for information sharing.","People":"Global population, particularly those at risk of contagious diseases, and communities impacted by lack of coordinated response.","Owner":"Regional and international organizations, national governments, public health agencies."},{"Description":"Risk of increased government intervention in markets and private life due to the response to the pandemic, leading to potential disruptions in economic and institutional capacities.","Impact":"Disruption of economic markets, loss of privacy, and potential erosion of public trust in government intervention.","Mitigation":"Balanced government intervention, transparent policy implementation, and safeguarding privacy rights through regulations and oversight.","Technologies":"Digital governance tools, privacy protection technologies, and economic impact assessment models.","People":"General population, businesses, and individuals impacted by government intervention.","Owner":"National governments, regulatory bodies, privacy advocates."}]}
